info.title: Resource Pool Management

delete.description: Resets the communication endpoint address the service instance must use to deliver information about its health state, execution state, failures and metrics.

parameters.description: The id of the registered listener

ResourceCollectionRef.description: an aggregate entity consisting of ResourceElement

@referredType.description: A string. Indicates the type of the referred object. This attribute is to be used when the object is representing a reference to an existing object instead of the of the object itself.

href.description: A string. Hyperlink to access the Resource collection.

name.description: Represents a user-friendly identifier of an object.

ReservationItem.description: An identified part of the reservation. A reservation is decomposed into one or more reservation items.

@type.description: A string. Generic attribute containing the name of the resource class type.

quantity.description: Represents the number of reservationItems that make up the reservation.

subReservationState.description: A string. The life cycle state of the each reservation item.

ChannelRef.description: Channel reference. The channel defines the channel for selling product offerings.

@referredType.description: The actual type of the target instance when needed for disambiguation.

RequestedPeriod.description:
The period of time for which user requested to use the resources.
The user can request on the start date without the end date.

@baseType.description: A string. Generic attribute indicating the base class type of the extension class of the current object. Useful only when the class type of the current  object is unknown to the implementation.

@schemaLocation.description: A string. Generic attribute containing the link to the schema that defines the structure of the class type of the current object.

@type.description: A string. Generic attribute containing the name of the resource class type.

daysOfWeek.description: A day or days representing when the schedule is applicable. For example 2, 3 represent Monday and Tuesday.

fromToDateTime.description:
The period of time for which the schedule is applicable. 
Instance values are mutually exclusive with daysOfWeek values.

rangeInterval.description:
An indicator that specifies the inclusion or exclusion of the from and to DateTime attributes. 
Possible values are "open", "closed", "closedBottom" and "closedTop".

validFor.description: The period of time during which the schedule is considered of interest to the business.

RelatedPartyRef.description: RelatedParty reference. A related party defines party or party role linked to a specific entity.

@referredType.description: A string. Indicates the type of the referred object. This attribute is to be used when the object is representing a reference to an existing object instead of the of the object itself.

href.description: A string. Reference of the related party, could be a party reference or a party role reference.

id.description: A string. Unique identifier of a related party.

name.description: A string. Name of the related party.

role.description: A string. Role of the related party.

ProductOfferingRef.description: ProductOffering reference. A product offering represents entities that are orderable from the provider of the catalog, this resource includes pricing information.

id.description: Unique identifier of the product offering

@referredType.description: The actual type of the target instance when needed for disambiguation.

ResourceCapacityDemand.description: the amount of capacity that is planned to be consumed or has been consumed.

@schemaLocation.description: A string. Generic attribute containing the link to the schema that defines the structure of the class type of the current object.

@type.description: A string. Indicates the (class) type of reservation.

capacityDemandAmount.description:
A value and units that define the CapacityDemand, such as 10000 ea, 10B Mb. 
Instance values are mutually exclusive with From and To capacityDemandAmounts and range interval.

AppliedCapacityAmount.description: The amount of CapcityDemand applied to a CapacityAmount.

@baseType.description: A string. Generic attribute indicating the base class type of the extension class of the current object. Useful only when the class type of the current  object is unknown to the implementation.

@schemaLocation.description: A string. Generic attribute containing the link to the schema that defines the structure of the class type of the current object.

@type.description: A string. Generic attribute containing the name of the resource class type.

appliedDemandAmount.description: An amount of demand applied to a CapacityAmount. Note that this is a composite attribute defined by CapacityAmount.

ApplicableTimePeriod.description: The period of time for which Capacity or CapacityDemand applies.

dayOfWeek.description: A day or days representing when the schedule is applicable. For example 2, 3 represent Monday and Tuesday.

fromToDateTime.description:

rangeInterval.description:
An indicator that specifies the inclusion or exclusion of the from and to DateTime attributes. 
Possible values are "open", "closed", "closedBottom" and "closedTop".

Used to define a place useful for the resource

message.description: (optional) Text that provide more details and corrective actions related to the error.
